statements: SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, water_requirement FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT id, crop_name, schedule_date FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE water_requirement > 50;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE weather_forecast LIKE '%rain%';
SELECT crop_name, water_requirement, schedule_date FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, AVG(water_requirement) AS avg_water_requirement FROM irrigation_schedules GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE water_requirement > 50 ORDER BY crop_name ASC, schedule_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM irrigation_schedules WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT crop_name, SUM(water_requirement) AS total_water_requirement FROM irrigation_schedules GROUP BY crop_name HAVING total_water_requirement > 100;
SELECT * FROM crop_schedule;
SELECT crop_name, weather_conditions FROM crop_schedule WHERE irrigation_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM crop_schedule WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT id, temperature FROM weather_forecast WHERE date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT humidity, temperature FROM weather_forecast WHERE precipitation > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM crop_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, irrigation_time, weather_conditions FROM crop_schedule WHERE irrigation_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT id, crop_name, weather_conditions FROM crop_schedule WHERE weather_conditions LIKE '%sunny%';
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast WHERE temperature > 30 AND precipitation < 5;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_forecast WHERE humidity > 80 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM Crop;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crop ORDER BY crop_type DESC;
SELECT forecast_id, date, temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT schedule_id, crop_id, forecast_id, irrigation_date, irrigation_duration FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE irrigation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY planting_date DESC, crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, irrigation_required FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_date, irrigation_required FROM Crop WHERE irrigation_required = TRUE ORDER BY crop_name ASC;

SELECT w.date, w.temperature, i.irrigation_date, i.irrigation_duration FROM WeatherForecast w INNER JOIN IrrigationSchedule i ON w.date = i.irrigation_date WHERE w.precipitation < 0.5 ORDER BY w.temperature DESC, i.irrigation_duration ASC;

SELECT c.crop_name, c.planting_date, i.irrigation_date, i.irrigation_duration FROM Crop c INNER JOIN IrrigationSchedule i ON c.crop_id = i.crop_id WHERE c.crop_type = 'Grain' ORDER BY c.planting_date ASC, i.irrigation_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM Crops;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, irrigation_schedule FROM Crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, irrigation_schedule FROM Crops ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE duration > 5 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT weather_forecast, temperature FROM WeatherForecast WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND temperature < 30;
SELECT crop_name, irrigation_schedule FROM Crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, weather_forecast, temperature FROM Crops INNER JOIN WeatherForecast ON Crops.crop_id = WeatherForecast.crop_id WHERE forecast = 'sunny';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT crop_name, start_date, end_date, forecast FROM Crops LEFT JOIN WeatherForecast ON Crops.crop_id = WeatherForecast.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM Crop;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crop WHERE planting_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT farm_name, location FROM Farm ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
SELECT forecast_date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT station_name, location FROM WeatherStation WHERE station_name LIKE '%east%';
SELECT * FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' AND planting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT forecast_date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherForecast WHERE humidity > 70 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, location FROM Farm WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY farm_name ASC;

SELECT ws.station_id, ws.station_name, ws.location, ws.station_id, is.irrigation_date, is.duration FROM WeatherStation ws INNER JOIN IrrigationSchedule is ON ws.station_id = is.station_id WHERE is.irrigation_date > '2022-03-15';

SELECT c.crop_name, f.farm_name, w.temperature, w.humidity, i.irrigation_date FROM Crop c INNER JOIN Farm f ON c.crop_id = f.crop_id INNER JOIN WeatherForecast w ON c.planting_date = w.forecast_date INNER JOIN IrrigationSchedule i ON c.crop_id = i.crop_id WHERE w.temperature > 25 AND i.duration >= 30 ORDER BY w.forecast_date DESC;
